document_data.name: Cadmium
document_data.mainbody: '''Cadmium''' was an elemental material found in the [[Realms]].
document_data.Availability: In {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}, the [[Elemental Store]] of [[Karsus Enclave]] sold pure elemental powdered cadmium for 15 [[gp]] per {{SI|1|ounce|long=yes}}.
document_data.Usages: * Cadmium was used in certain metalworking and smelting processes.
